Sub-task.title: [Tooling] Slingclipse should expose the operations it performs and their results
[Tooling] Add ability to Import from Sling Repository
[Tooling] adding support for .content.xml files on save
[Tooling] Slingclipse import wizard should use the Eclipse APIs to create resources
[Tooling] Target platform definition should include sources if possible
[Tooling] Slingclipse import wizard should notify the user in case of errors
[Tooling] Add a Sling project nature to control projects being synchronized
[Tooling] create text-only console that exposes the operations performed and their results
[Tooling] Usability improvements for the Slingclipse import wizard
[Tooling] Align Eclipse tooling to proposed structure
Unable to delete a top-level node in the content browser

Disable content sync when importing content

[Tooling] proper handle xml-encoded path-parts

StringIndexOutOfBoundsException within ContentXmlHandler.java:210

Incorrect filtering for full coverage nodes
Resource deletion no longer obeys filters

Ignore vlt tracking files when publishing content
Compilation error in impl-vlt-test with Java 6

Never try to install bundles if the support bundle is not installed
SlingIDE Import Content wizard should respect .vltignore files
XML Namespaces shouldn't appear in JCR Properties List
Cannot remove Bundle or Content Package Module from Server

Unable to change node primary type once created

New sling bundle project wizard fails - java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
Content sync does not propagate mixin types
Never run project launches when publishing
it tests in tooling/ide/eclipse-test fail on MacOS X with SWTException: Invalid thread access
Properties from extended file aggregates are not synchronized
Cannot add null entries, when creating a new bundle and adding it to an existing server
Assertion failed when trying to create new Sling Bundle project
children of folder, containing files besides .content.xml, will get deleted on content-sync
Creating new nodes within a new Sling Content Project leads to NPE

Content navigator icon is jagged
Sling server and module icons are jagged due to downscaling

property type not always shown, eg not for sling:resourceType

StringIndexOutOfBoundsException with empty {Binary} property
Install bundles via bundle upload preference is not obeyed
Ensure that LICENSE and NOTICE files are present in the distributed jars
it tests in tooling/ide/eclipse-test fail on MacOS due to missing (default) JRE
Bundle installation errors do not report the message, only the status code
NPE when trying to change the primary node type from nt:folder to sling:Folder

Ignore publish requests if the server is stopped
No repository found at ... URL scheme http not supported. only
Improve Conversion To Bundle and Content Projects
'Child node ordering not supported' when republishing tree
nested nodes below file/jcr:content cause problems on import and export

in the 'setup server' wizard page: provide option to not start server automatically

Incorrect handling of deeply nested aggregates

New Feature.title: [Tooling] show content of .content.xml in project explorer
[Tooling] support auto-deploy of osgi bundles from eclipse to a running sling launchpad
[Tooling] support connecting to sling launchpad in debug mode
[Tooling] add a 'new' wizard for creating an application based on a maven archetype
[Tooling] add 'new sling bundle' wizard to the slingclipse plugins
[Tooling] show bundle state of module in wst-servers view
Inspect bundles for deployment for well-known errors
Make RepositoryFactory statefull, allow a Repository to be stopped

Improvement.title: [Tooling] Eclipse plugins/features for Sling-based development
[Tooling] Logging framework for Slingclipse
Manually trigger sync on files/directories
[Tooling] Separate m2eclipse dependent extensions from others, in slingclipse
Remove local path from content import wizard
Repository: API needs a single method to create a node and set its non-binary properties
Track bundle deployment operations in the Sling console view
[Tooling] integrate with decentXml for minimal changes on .content.xml modifications
Include Orbit plugins in update site
Add key binding for importing content from the repository
Allow manual publishing of content
Improve error reporting when connecting to a launchpad instance fails
Allow installing/updating the install support bundle from the servers view
Centralize and improve embedded artifact handling
Configure -> Convert to Bundle/Content Package project should not assume the project is Maven-based
Sling virtual resource tree only appears in the Project Explorer, not the Package Explorer
Add new simple project content wizard
Eclipse has to be restarted any time you change project facet
Integration tests running against a live Sling Launchpad instance
Allow importing content from arbitrary locations
Sling console: keep console history since start
Add node type decorator for jcr nodes
Update icon for non-file/folder nodes
Usability improvements in the Sling bundle module wizard
Provide a m2e project configurator for packaging "bundle"
Follow vlt formatting when adding a property to eg .content.xml via Jcr Properties view
Support changing jcr:primaryType to/from nt:folder
Auto-completion in node type combo, when creating new (jcr) node
JCR Properties view: boolean values are not validated according to the type
Refine 'connected' state of a (vlt) repository, cache node types after disconnection properly
JCR Properties view: improve keyboard navigation/selection
Support changing multiple flag in jcr properties view
In the 'new projects' wizards: warn appropriately if a project already exists with the chosen name

Task.title: Set up code signing for the p2 artifacts
Remove embedded bundle archetype in favour of released version
Review strings for correctness and consistency
Provide Date/Time Cell-Editor for the properties view
Add 'upload (full republish)' action to module context menu in wst server view
JCR Properties view property type display bug
Provide Import/Export Content actions also in the content browser tree
'force' bundle deploy when doing 'clean and publish' and in debug mode
